description.value: Your eidolon gains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tremorsense]{Tremorsense} as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet. If aquatic, it gains @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Wavesense]{Wavesense} as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet instead. If amphibious, it gains both.
